trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud has something he wishes to tell you.

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SEQ_01<tab>With Calyx defeated and his schemes undone, it is time for you and your companions to consider the future. Though the matter of investigating the Ascians' interference in historical events of the Ninth remains, Y'shtola volunteers to continue working with Shale to lay bare any lingering secrets, leaving Alphinaud and Alisaie free to return to their efforts to aid the people of Garlemald. Via a sudden linkpearl call, you learn that Erenville, too, will soon be departing for lands afar, so you hasten to the Backroom to collect Shale, who surely wishes to say her own farewells.

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SEQ_02<tab>You find Shale precisely where you expected: at her station in the Backroom. To your companions' surprise, she is tempted away from her work with little fuss. Apparently, the documents recovered from the containment complex still require time to decrypt, and so she is free to attend to personal matters─such as seeing off a taciturn Viera.

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SEQ_03<tab>You arrive at High Tide Harbor to find Erenville resigned to his fate, though he nevertheless makes a token protest at being subject to fond farewells. Now, all that remains is to wait for Alphinaud and Alisaie to join you.

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SEQ_04<tab>Those remaining in Tural offer heartfelt good-byes and promises of future reunions to those departing. As you see them off, the ship carrying Erenville, Alphinaud, and Alisaie gradually shrinks to a tiny dot on the horizon, before vanishing entirely.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SEQ_05<tab>What comes next, along with your role in it, remains unclear. By the sounds of it, however, Krile has an idea...
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shale in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Erenville at High Tide Harbor.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_TODO_02<tab>Wait at the meeting point.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>I am told that Shale is the new leader of Oblivion. There is none better suited to carrying on Cahciua and Geode's legacy.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_KRILE_000_002<tab>Eager as ever, our Alphinaud. I do hope he has thought this through...particularly where his sister's wrath is concerned.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_KRILE_000_003<tab>She may know full well that no amount of complaint will dissuade him, but that doesn't mean she won't still give him an earful.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_GRAHATIA_000_004<tab>It feels like an age since we last met here.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_005<tab>It comforts me to know that some of you will be staying. I would feel rather bereft should you all go at once!
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_011<tab>What news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Can't imagine you brought an entourage along to simply say hello.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_012<tab>That eager to be on their way, are they?
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_013<tab>I'll join you. I owe them thanks on behalf of Oblivion, after all.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_YSHTOLA_000_014<tab>And there I thought you would protest against being parted from your work.

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_015<tab>While I am curious to see what emerges once every piece of the puzzle's in place, the majority of the files we've unearthed are encrypted. There's little else I can do until the computer's finished with them.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_016<tab>...Besides, unlike our friends, Containment Complex 10-29 isn't going anywhere.

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_YSHTOLA_000_017<tab>In other words, we won't be getting any answers <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((tonight)) ((today)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((today)) ((tonight)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_018<tab>Afraid not. It's going to be a while yet.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_019<tab>Then shall we depart for Tuliyollal forthwith? Even Lamaty'i's strength has its limits...
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>Without further delay, then!
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_YSHTOLA_000_031<tab>Despite her protestations, I doubt Alisaie will keep us waiting long.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_KRILE_000_032<tab>Raha seems preoccupied with a matter of great import. Perhaps he is contemplating a prayer to Llymlaen for their safe passage.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_GRAHATIA_000_033<tab>What sort of tacos should I get on the way back, do you think? The aroma is too tantalizing to ignore...
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_034<tab>Tuliyollal is a delight to look upon. They hang patterned cloth where we might use neon, but the city feels no less bright.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>Koana and Gulool Ja weren't able to make it, but both send their regards.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_036<tab>Wish we had some of this sea breeze inside the dome. We could perhaps simulate it, but there's no substitute for the real thing.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ERENVILLE_000_041<tab>I wish you all would not make such a fuss... I am not fond of emotional partings.

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ERENVILLE_000_042<tab>At least Alphinaud and Alisaie were considerate enough to inform me of their plans in advance by linkpearl. <var 1A 02 /var>Some<var 1A 01 /var> people we know would have burst out of a crate mid-voyage...
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ERENVILLE_000_043<tab>In any event, I shall wait here until they finish their preparations.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ERENVILLE_000_051<tab>It will be pleasant to have some company for the journey back.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_YSHTOLA_000_061<tab>For our many meetings and partings, we have few enough opportunities to properly say our farewells. 'Twas pleasant to take the time for it.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_GRAHATIA_000_062<tab>Though I delight in companionship, solo journeys too have their appeal. And travel by sea <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> relaxing...

TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_063<tab>With Alisaie and Alphinaud spreading word of Alexandria, we shall soon have the chance to establish relations with other nations. I must make ready to treat with their leaders.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_SHALE_000_064<tab>I'm glad I got the chance to see him off. Cahciua would be glad, too.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_KRILE_000_071<tab>Now it is our turn to take the next step.
TEXT_KINGMJ101_05426_KRILE_000_072<tab>The question is in what direction, and that is a matter I should like to discuss with you.
